Name: The Lone Chameleon
About the game: The Lone Chameleon is a 2D puzzle-game. You control 4 characters with unique abilities and make them work together to solve challenging puzzles. Jump, avoid paralyzing rays and use moving pillars wisely to escape these rooms where every steps count. New mechanics are introduced regulary throughout the 60 levels of the game. Small scenes here and there will depict a discrete yet touching narrative.
Meta Title: The Lone Chameleon: Feb 27, 2018, Spidove and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Lone Chameleon? Check out the release date (Feb 27, 2018), developer insights from Spidove, and a complete game summary.
